Iris, or Ris, is a non-binary visual communicator who likes to draw, design, animate, code, and eat. Most of the time you will find them doing a combination of the above.

Iris has volunteered with organizations aimed at increasing diversity in the design and tech field, and has read several magazines and possibly a book. Their personal work focuses on the liminal space between things that are cute and things that are cool.

Based in Calgary, they are currently a full time product designer at Versett, and a full time cat parent at home.
